Description: The Sail.js Node.js Framework is designed to help developers create Node.js websites and applications. It provides methods for managing assets, uploading files, and managing features.

The Hapi framework's objective is to be a configuration-centric framework with built-in support for input validation, caching, authentication, and other essential facilities for building web and services applications. hapi enables developers to focus on writing reusable application logic in a highly modular and prescriptive approach.

Pomelo offers developers a scalable game server framework for node.js. The framework provides the development framework and many related components, including libraries and tools. Pomelo aims to be suitable for real-time web applications; its distributed architecture makes pomelo scale differently than other real-time frameworks.

Provides extensible common utility classes for rapid JSON API development. Offers the following functionality for abstration of middleware specific code for framework agnostic use; handling of request/response lifecycle; built in CRUD functionality via find, findOne, create, update, delete functions for various resources.
Noder Node.js framework aims to be a lightweight and flexible core to create a scalable API. Starting a project quickly with a modular API.
Restify is a Node.js framework that intends to offer a micro-framework for building REST APIs.

RhapsodyJS aims to be a HMVC framework that runs on top of Express 4 while also creating a RESTful API for models. Additionally, it supports sockets, middleware/policies system, and includes other features.

Koa aims to be an expressive HTTP middleware for node.js to make web applications and APIs less complicated to write. Koa's middleware stack flows in a stack-like manner, allowing developers to perform actions downstream then filter and manipulate the response upstream. Koa's use of generators also facilates readability and robustness to an application.
Percolator aims to be a framework for building quality HTTP APIs in Node.js. It's features include quality, public-facing APIs, single page and mobile applications.

KeystoneJS is a Node.js framework that intends to provide a content management system and web application framework built onexpress and mongoose. Keystone offers the ability to create web sites and application, and comes with an auto-generated Admin UI.
diet.js aims to be a modular node.js web framework that offers scalable application and API development.

Restberry intends to provide a framework for setting up RESTful JSON APIs with NodeJS. It allows for the indentification of models and setup CRUD API calls without the need for code writing to write code. API calls handle and identify issues as well as issue necessary HTTP responses and alerts to debug error responses. Restberry also provides authentication and permission checks and throws appropriate errors.

The Loopback Node.js API Framework by StrongLoop provides a dynamic open source Node.js framework optimized for building end-to-end APIs for mobile, web, and other devices. The Loopback framework offers a set of Node.js modules that can be used together or independently to build applications. Developers can connect to multiple data sources, write business logic in Node.js, glue on top of existing services and data, connect using JS, iOS & Android SDKs, and much more.
The Actionhero.js framework aims to be a multi-transport Node.JS API Server with integrated cluster capabilities and delayed tasks..

Danf intends to provide a javascript/node.js full-stack isomorphic OOP framework allowing to code the same way on both client-side (browser) and server-side (node.js). It provides many features to produce scalable, maintainable, testable and performant applications.
The COKE Node.js framework aims to provide developers with a full stack MVC framework that expedites web development.
SocketStream aims to be a Node.js framework for realtime web applications.
Chocolatejs Node.js Framework aims to be a full stack and isomorphic Node.js web framework and online ide. The framework is an experimental Node.js web application framework built using Coffeescript.

The Sane Stack is a Node.js framework that offers developers a Sails and Ember cli to faciliate application development. This framework is cited as being an early prototype with further developments to come.
Catberry is a Node.js framework that offers developers Flux architecture, isomorphic web-components and progressive rendering.

AllcountJS Node.js Framework intends to provide an open source full-stack Node.js framework for application development. The framework's objective is to be designed to build production-ready web and mobile business applications. It offers business applications such for basic ones like CRUD as well as the more complex such as CRM, inventory, accounting and other enterprise systems that have domain objects with different views.

Koa is a Node.js web framework that allows users to ditch callbacks and increase error handling by leveraging generators. It's designed by the same team that designed Express. Koa was made to be smaller, more expressive, and more robust.

Mediator is a JavaScript framework that intends to provide a class that allows a developer to register, unregister, and call subscriber methods to help event-based, asyncronous programming. The framework's purpose is to make the usage of WebSockets, Ajax calls, DOM events, or other asynchronous operations easy to maintain and test.
The 140 Medley JavaScript Framework by Honza Pokorny aims to be a micro-framework or a collection of small, helpful utilities for common javascript tasks.
The Rococo JavaScript Framework offers developers a strict subset of Javascript (BlackScript). BlackScript is like Javascript but has no:

The Janis JavaScript frameworks aims to be a lightweight framework that provides animations via CSS transitions for modern browsers on the web as well as mobile devices. The goal of the framework is to organize commonly used methods of animating DOM elements in JavaScript.
The Lotus Ruby Framework offers developers an Object Oriented Programming option to web development,

The Padrinorb ruby Framework's goal is offer developers core principles of the Sinatra Ruby Framework while creating a standard library of tools, helpers and functions that will make Sinatra suitable for increasingly complex applications.
